Roughly 0.2% of sales rows are labeled as eco products.
The summer season records the highest number of purchases, as shopping activity peaks in warm months.
The Pastry category leads overall sales, confirming its popularity among customers.
The average receipt total is around €28.91; the median receipt is €18.95.
About 12.5% of all receipts contain only one item, showing that many shoppers make quick, single-product purchases.
